name: Piemon
description: Piedmon is a humanoid Digimon designed after the Pierrot and other entertainers of the jester archetype, with additional influences from the mythological Paimon . It wears a flamboyant, multi-colored outfit as well as a mask hiding most of its facial features, blue ribbons on its outfit and a ruff around his neck. It has four swords on the "Magic Box" on its back, the pommels of which are designed after the four traditional suits for playing cards: "Clubs", "Diamonds", "Hearts", and "Spades".
